Package com.pandora.config.reactions

package com.pandora.config.reactions
The com.pandora.config.reactions package contains classes related to the configuration and implementation of oxidation reactions in the biogeochemical simulation system. This package includes classes such as OxidationDoc, which represents a specific oxidation reaction involving Dissolved Organic Carbon (DOC) species.

The classes in this package are annotated with Spring annotations such as ConditionalOnProperty and Configuration, indicating their role in the Spring Boot configuration. The OxidationDoc class extends the .reactions.abstractions.Oxidation class, specializing it for DOC species.

Developers extending or configuring oxidation reactions within the system can explore and utilize the classes in this package for specific scenarios.

See Also:

  • Oxidation

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.pandora.config
    The com.pandora.config.species package contains classes and interfaces related to the configuration and management of biogeochemical species in PANDORA.
    com.pandora.config.reactions.abstractions
    This package provides abstractions for configuring and modeling chemical reactions in the context of biogeochemistry.
    com.pandora.config.services
    The com.pandora.config.services package provides services and interfaces related to the configuration and management of biogeochemical reactions and species in a freshwater context.
    com.pandora.config.species
    The com.pandora.config.species package contains classes and interfaces related to the configuration and management of biogeochemical species in the Pandora biogeochemical model.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    OxidationDoc
    Configuration class for oxidation reactions involving Dissolved Organic Carbon (DOC) species.
